masterTranslation: Path to the folder where all translations in that folder will be applied for the entire website.
buildPath: The path where Static Wind will put the built result to
buildScript: The path of the build script
buildVersion: The path to the file that track build version
sitemap: Put the base url here to generate a sitemap.txt file at the root folder
sitemapPath: The path of the sitemap relative to build path or default at /sitemap.txt
releaseItems: Path to folder/files that need to be released
